article_title: Republican Bost defeats incumbent Enyart in Southern Illinois congressional race

og.description: Meanwhile, in the 13th Congressional District, GOP incumbent Rodney Davis soundly defeated Democratic challenger and former Madison County Circuit Court Judge Ann Callis.
